bibl.title: Check-List of Demotic Text Editions and Re-Editions Presented on the Occasion of the Fifth International Conference for Demotic Studies in Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993. (Uitgaven vanwege de stichting "Het Leids Papyrologisch Instituut". 14.)
bibl.note: The main purpose of the list is the entirely practical one of coining abbreviations for demotic text editions (including bilingual documents).

VLEEMING S.P. and A.A. DEN BRINKER, Check-List of Demotic Text Editions and Re-Editions Presented on the Occasion of the Fifth International Conference for Demotic Studies in Pisa, 4th-8th September 1993. (Uitgaven vanwege de stichting "Het Leids Papyrologisch Instituut". 14.)
